tool_description: A simple API for playing the Rock Paper Scissors game, allowing users to make their choice and receive a response.

api_list.name: Choice Endpoint
api_list.description: Endpoint for users to submit their choice in the Rock Paper Scissors game.

required_parameters.name: choice
required_parameters.description: The user's choice in the game, which can be 'rock', 'paper', or 'scissors'.
